docs.lead_paragraph: The absence of a protein that coats sperm and allows them to reach an egg more easily could be the potential cause for unexplained cases of male infertility.

headline.seo: Study Links Male Infertility to a Missing Protein
headline.main: Study Links Male Infertility to a Missing Protein
headline.print_headline: Study Links Male Infertility to a Missing Protein

docs.snippet: The absence of a protein that coats sperm and allows them to reach an egg more easily could be the potential cause for unexplained cases of male infertility.

docs.lead_paragraph: Should states take children from their parents and place them in foster care in cases of “life-threatening childhood obesity”? It is not a new question (I wrote this magazine article about it several years ago), but it was given new amplification and caused a new uproar when advocated in a commentary in the most recent Journal of the American Medical Association.

headline.main: Removing  Obese Children From Their Parents

docs.abstract: How what you eat in utero can affect your child’s health for decades.
docs.snippet: How what you eat in utero can affect your child’s health for decades.
